unittitle_ssm: Town of Southampton School District No. 11 proceedings and census records
abstract_ssm: This collection consists of two bound volumes containing proceedings of the officers and inhabitants of the town of Southampton School District No. 11 in Long Island, N.Y. for the period 1819 to 1862. Also included are periodic district censuses containing lists of parents and the number of children they have who will be attending school.  Censuses also include references to African American children.
